thread.title: Former UCLA, NBA player Dave Meyers dies at 62
thread.title_full: Former UCLA, NBA player Dave Meyers dies at 62

title: Former UCLA, NBA player Dave Meyers dies at 62
text: > Sports Former UCLA, NBA player Dave Meyers dies at 62 FILE - In this Jan. 1974, file photo, UCLA's Dave Meyers looks for the ball after losing it against Notre Dame's Adrian Dantley during an NCAA college basketball game in South Bend, Ind. Meyers, the star forward who led UCLA to the 1975 NCAA basketball championship as the team's lone senior in coach John Wooden's final season and later played for the NBA's Milwaukee Bucks, died Friday, Oct. 9, 2015. He was 62. (AP Photo/File)
